title: Network Rebellion
story_summary: Neighborhoods link up with a new mesh network, letting people share resources and speak openly about BCI abuses. Local assemblies take charge as Oksana sides with the grassroots. The Congress loses control. Celebrations spread as Stenograd becomes a city run by its own people at last.

official.headline: New Connections Form
official.anchor_line: Local communities begin launching advanced mesh networks for improved communication and shared resources.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd residents embrace technology-driven collaboration, bolstering civic stability and neighborhood empowerment.

official.headline: Transparency Strengthened
official.anchor_line: Citizen-led forums openly discuss Behavioral Compliance Index outcomes and citywide recovery experiences.
official.contextual_reframing: Public forums encourage dialogue and promote a transparent culture, supporting collective learning and resilient governance.

official.headline: Communities Chart Future
official.anchor_line: Neighborhood assemblies independently manage affairs and communication, with leaders supporting decentralized progress.
official.contextual_reframing: The adaptive spirit of Stenograd is on display as local initiative and shared innovation lead the path to enduring unity.

underground.headline: Official Silence, Real Chaos
underground.anchor_line: Mesh networks are lighting up across neighborhoods as people dodge info blackouts and Council censors.
underground.contextual_reframing: Forget stability. Locals are done waiting for orders - sharing food, warnings, and truth off-grid. The city adapts faster than the system can catch up.

underground.headline: BCI Abuses Exposed
underground.anchor_line: Testimonies flood the mesh as survivors speak out on BCI punishments and rigged privilege for Congress friends.
underground.contextual_reframing: Secrecy cracked wide open. Voices once hidden by biometric firewalls are everywhere. Forgiveness never meant forgetting.

underground.headline: Stenograd Breaks Free
underground.anchor_line: Whole districts declare independence and run on mesh networks with support from Oksana and defectors.
underground.contextual_reframing: Official power is outpaced. The future? Built from the ground up, not handed down by algorithm or privilege. This is what real governance looks like.
